original_text: One day, Saul was on the hill near Gibeah. He was sitting under a tamarisk tree. He was holding a spear. All his officers stood round him. Then someone told Saul that they knew where David and his men were hiding.
korean_text: 사울이 다윗과 그와 함께 있는 사람들이 나타났다 함을 들으니라 그 때에 사울이 기브아 높은 곳에서 손에 단창을 들고 에셀 나무 아래에 앉았고 모든 신하들은 그의 곁에 섰더니

sentences.original_text: One day, Saul was on the hill near Gibeah
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 사울은 기브아 근처 언덕에 있었고

sentences.original_text: He was sitting under a tamarisk tree
All his officers stood round him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 장교들이 그를 둘러싸고 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: that they knew where David and his men were hiding
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다윗과 그의 부하들이 숨어있는 곳을 안다고
